notesStmt.note: Yeḥiel ben Daṿid Soreḳ: inscribed with his name, 16th-century Italian hand (folio 2v).
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Festival prayer book (maḥzor) for Rosh ha-Shanah and Yom Kipur, North African rite.
